Pre-Game Insights: Cleveland is on a four-game road winning streak heading into the matchup with Dallas.
The Dallas Mavericks have a 10-5 record in home games and are facing Cleveland, which has a strong 29-4 record in the Eastern Conference.
Kyrie Irving is averaging 24.3 points and 4.9 assists for the Mavericks, while Evan Mobley is averaging 18.4 points, 8.7 rebounds, and 1.5 blocks for the Cavaliers.
The Mavericks have struggled in games decided by three points or fewer, while the Cavaliers are strong defensively, allowing only 111.4 points per game on average.
